name: ClickBake!
description:
An entry for Mini Jam 94: Baking. 

Try to bake anough cakes to repair your broken oven. You have to manage the temperature regimes, buy upgrades and rise your pastry level. But beware, the intricacies of the process are greater than you might have anticipated!

Used assets:
- CoffeeShop Starter Pack from the asset store
